root.name: Porky Pig's Haunted Holiday
root.description: OverviewPorky Pig's Haunted Holiday is a sidescrolling platformer, in which the player guides Porky Pig through several of his nightmares. These nightmares include a forest, a western town, Atlantis, a mine, the alps, and a castle. This title was notable for being the only game staring Porky Pig, and its unique weather system, in which the weather cycles through seasons.
